about_the_game:
Prepare to face the Trials with the Reagent Starter Pack, which includes an exclusive set of 4 legendary outfits, cell items, cell posters and player icons to help you customize what is sure to be a horrifying experience.
Includes the following:
• Space Oddity Vapor Suit
• Hazard Ignorance Suit
• Bidendum Glut Suit
• Chemistry Teacher Suit
• Futterman Doll cell item
• Stun Rod cell item
• Mannequin Skinned cell item
• Teeth Bowl cell item
• Police Badge cell item
• Pistachios cell item
• 3 exclusive The Outlast Trials cell posters
• 3 exclusive The Outlast Trials player icons

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content, Nudity
